availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Thomas E. Young (Metcalfe County, Kentucky, clerk.)

body.p: Metcalfe County, Kentucky, farmer and clerk. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Young in 1859. Father of William P. Young. Married to Sophia W. Perkins Young on January 24, 1861 in Metcalfe, Kentucky. Farmer in Barren County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Metcalfe County, Kentucky in 1860. Court clerk in Metcalfe County, Kentucky in 1864.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Barren, District 2, p. 416B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Metcalfe, p. 875.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Metcalfe, Edmunton, p. 11B.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Metcalfe County, KY, February 1864, p. 115, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Metcalfe County Marriages, p.1.
